General.Name: EDM Resources Inc
General.Description: EDM Resources Inc. engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for zinc, lead, and gypsum mineral deposits. It owns 100% interest in the Scotia Mine and various other mineral resource prospects in Halifax in Nova Scotia. The company was formerly known as ScoZinc Mining Ltd. and changed its name to EDM Resources Inc. in January 2022. EDM Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Halifax, Canada.
General.Address: Purdy's Wharf Tower 1, Halifax, NS, Canada, B3J 3N2
